headline: Uber’s US$100m Robotaxi Charging Bet And What It Means For Valuation
summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) has announced a $100 million investment to build autonomous vehicle charging hubs in key US cities. The company plans large scale installations of DC fast charging stations and is partnering with multiple global chargepoint operators. This move is aimed at supporting future robotaxi operations and responding to competitive pressure in autonomous mobility. Uber Technologies, trading at $72.77, is putting fresh capital to work in physical infrastructure tied...
